1901.definition: [ἐπεκτείνομαι] middle voice from {{G1909}} and {{G1614}}; to stretch (oneself) forward upon

1902.definition: [ἐπενδύομαι] middle voice from {{G1909}} and {{G1746}}; to invest upon oneself

1903.definition: [ἐπενδύτης] from {{G1902}}; a wrapper, i.e. outer garment

1904.definition: [ἐπέρχομαι] from {{G1909}} and {{G2064}}; to supervene, i.e. arrive, occur, impend, attack, (figuratively) influence

1905.definition: [ἐπερωτάω] from {{G1909}} and {{G2065}}; to ask for, i.e. inquire, seek

1907.definition: [ἐπέχω] from {{G1909}} and {{G2192}}; to hold upon, i.e. (by implication) to retain; (by extension) to detain; (with implication, of {{G3563}}) to pay attention to

1908.definition: [ἐπηρεάζω] from a comparative of {{G1909}} and (probably) ἀρειά (threats); to insult, slander

1909.definition: [ἐπί] a primary preposition; properly, meaning superimposition (of time, place, order, etc.), as a relation of distribution (with the genitive case), i.e. over, upon, etc.; of rest (with the dative case) at, on, etc.; of direction (with the accusative case) towards, upon, etc. In compounds it retains essentially the same import, at, upon, etc. (literally or figuratively).

1910.definition: [ἐπιβαίνω] from {{G1909}} and the base of {{G939}}; to walk upon, i.e. mount, ascend, embark, arrive

1911.definition: [ἐπιβάλλω] from {{G1909}} and {{G906}}; to throw upon (literal or figurative, transitive or reflexive; usually with more or less force); specially (with {{G1438}} implied) to reflect; impersonally, to belong to

1912.definition: [ἐπιβαρέω] from {{G1909}} and {{G916}}; to be heavy upon, i.e. (pecuniarily) to be expensive to; figuratively, to be severe towards

1913.definition: [ἐπιβιβάζω] from {{G1909}} and a reduplicated derivative of the base of {{G939}} (compare {{G307}}); to cause to mount (an animal)

1914.definition: [ἐπιβλέπω] from {{G1909}} and {{G991}}; to gaze at (with favor, pity or partiality)

1917.definition: [ἐπιβουλή] from a presumed compound of {{G1909}} and {{G1014}}; a plan against someone, i.e. a plot

1918.definition: [ἐπιγαμβρεύω] from {{G1909}} and a derivative of {{G1062}}; to form affinity with, i.e. (specially) in a levirate way

1920.definition: [ἐπιγίνομαι] from {{G1909}} and {{G1096}}; to arrive upon, i.e. spring up (as a wind)

1921.definition: [ἐπιγινώσκω] from {{G1909}} and {{G1097}}; to know upon some mark, i.e. recognize; by implication, to become fully acquainted with, to acknowledge

1922.definition: [ἐπίγνωσις] from {{G1921}}; recognition, i.e. (by implication) full discernment, acknowledgement

1924.definition: [ἐπιγράφω] from {{G1909}} and {{G1125}}; to inscribe (physically or mentally)

1925.definition: [ἐπιδείκνυμι] from {{G1909}} and {{G1166}}; to exhibit (physically or mentally)

1926.definition: [ἐπιδέχομαι] from {{G1909}} and {{G1209}}; to admit (as a guest or (figuratively) teacher)

1927.definition: [ἐπιδημέω] from a compound of {{G1909}} and {{G1218}}; to make oneself at home, i.e. (by extension) to reside (in a foreign country)

1928.definition: [ἐπιδιατάσσομαι] middle voice from {{G1909}} and {{G1299}}; to appoint besides, i.e. supplement (as a codicil)

1929.definition: [ἐπιδίδωμι] from {{G1909}} and {{G1325}}; to give over (by hand or surrender)

1930.definition: [ἐπιδιορθόω] from {{G1909}} and a derivative of {{G3717}}; to straighten further, i.e. (figuratively) arrange additionally

1931.definition: [ἐπιδύω] from {{G1909}} and {{G1416}}; to set fully (as the sun)

1932.definition: [ἐπιείκεια] from {{G1933}}; suitableness, i.e. (by implication) equity, mildness

1933.definition: [ἐπιεικής] from {{G1909}} and {{G1503}}; appropriate, i.e. (by implication) mild

1934.definition: [ἐπιζητέω] from {{G1909}} and {{G2212}}; to search (inquire) for; intensively, to demand, to crave

1937.definition: [ἐπιθυμέω] from {{G1909}} and {{G2372}}; to set the heart upon, i.e. long for (rightfully or otherwise)

1939.definition: [ἐπιθυμία] from {{G1937}}; a longing (especially for what is forbidden)

1941.definition: [ἐπικαλέομαι] middle voice from {{G1909}} and {{G2564}}; to entitle; by implication, to invoke (for aid, worship, testimony, decision, etc.)

1943.definition: [ἐπικαλύπτω] from {{G1909}} and {{G2572}}; to conceal, i.e. (figuratively) forgive

1944.definition: [ἐπικατάρατος] from {{G1909}} and a derivative of {{G2672}}; imprecated, i.e. execrable

1945.definition: [ἐπίκειμαι] from {{G1909}} and {{G2749}}; to rest upon (literally or figuratively)

1946.definition: [Ἐπικούρειος] from Ἐπίκουρος (compare {{G1947}}) (a noted philosopher); an Epicurean or follower of Epicurus

1947.definition: [ἐπικουρία] from a compound of {{G1909}} and a (prolonged) form of the base of {{G2877}} (in the sense of servant); assistance

1949.definition: [ἐπιλαμβάνομαι] middle voice from {{G1909}} and {{G2983}}; to seize (for help, injury, attainment, or any other purpose; literally or figuratively)

1950.definition: [ἐπιλανθάνομαι] middle voice from {{G1909}} and {{G2990}}; to lose out of mind; by implication, to neglect

1951.definition: [ἐπιλέγομαι] middle voice from {{G1909}} and {{G3004}}; to surname, select

1952.definition: [ἐπιλείπω] from {{G1909}} and {{G3007}}; to leave upon, i.e. (figuratively) to be insufficient for

1954.definition: [ἐπίλοιπος] from {{G1909}} and {{G3062}}; left over, i.e. remaining

1956.definition: [ἐπιλύω] from {{G1909}} and {{G3089}}; to solve further, i.e. (figuratively) to explain, decide

1957.definition: [ἐπιμαρτυρέω] from {{G1909}} and {{G3140}}; to attest further, i.e. corroborate

1959.definition: [ἐπιμελέομαι] middle voice from {{G1909}} and the same as {{G3199}}; to care for (physically or otherwise)

1960.definition: [ἐπιμελῶς] adverb from a derivative of {{G1959}}; carefully

1961.definition: [ἐπιμένω] from {{G1909}} and {{G3306}}; to stay over, i.e. remain (figuratively, persevere)

1962.definition: [ἐπινεύω] from {{G1909}} and {{G3506}}; to nod at, i.e. (by implication) to assent

1963.definition: [ἐπίνοια] from {{G1909}} and {{G3563}}; attention of the mind, i.e. (by implication) purpose

1965.definition: [ἐπίορκος] from {{G1909}} and {{G3727}}; on oath, i.e. (falsely) a forswearer

1966.definition: [ἐπιοῦσα] feminine singular participle of a comparative of {{G1909}} and εἶμι (to go); supervening, i.e. ({{G2250}} or {{G3571}} being expressed or implied) the ensuing day or night

1967.definition: [ἐπιούσιος] perhaps from the same as {{G1966}}; tomorrow's; but more probably from {{G1909}} and a derivative of the present participle feminine of {{G1510}}; for subsistence, i.e. needful

1968.definition: [ἐπιπίπτω] from {{G1909}} and {{G4098}}; to embrace (with affection) or seize (with more or less violence; literally or figuratively)

1969.definition: [ἐπιπλήσσω] from {{G1909}} and {{G4141}}; to chastise, i.e. (with words) to upbraid

1970.definition: [ἐπιπνίγω] from {{G1909}} and {{G4155}}; to throttle upon, i.e. (figuratively) overgrow

1971.definition: [ἐπιποθέω] from {{G1909}} and potheo (to yearn); to dote upon, i.e. intensely crave possession (lawfully or wrongfully)

1973.definition: [ἐπιπόθητος] from {{G1909}} and a derivative of the latter part of {{G1971}}; yearned upon, i.e. greatly loved

1975.definition: [ἐπιπορεύομαι] from {{G1909}} and {{G4198}}; to journey further, i.e. travel on (reach)

1976.definition: [ἐπιῤῥάπτω] from {{G1909}} and the base of {{G4476}}; to stitch upon, i.e. fasten with the needle

1977.definition: [ἐπιῤῥίπτω] from {{G1909}} and {{G4496}}; to throw upon (literally or figuratively)

1978.definition: [ἐπίσημος] from {{G1909}} and some form of the base of {{G4591}}; remarkable, i.e. (figuratively) eminent

1979.definition: [ἐπισιτισμός] from a compound of {{G1909}} and a derivative of {{G4621}}; a provisioning, i.e. (concretely) food

1980.definition: [ἐπισκέπτομαι] middle voice from {{G1909}} and the base of {{G4649}}; to inspect, i.e. (by implication) to select; by extension, to go to see, relieve

1981.definition: [ἐπισκηνόω] from {{G1909}} and {{G4637}}; to tent upon, i.e. (figuratively) abide with

1982.definition: [ἐπισκιάζω] from {{G1909}} and a derivative of {{G4639}}; to cast a shade upon, i.e. (by analogy) to envelop in a haze of brilliancy; figuratively, to invest with preternatural influence

1983.definition: [ἐπισκοπέω] from {{G1909}} and {{G4648}}; to oversee; by implication, to beware

1984.definition: [ἐπισκοπή] from {{G1980}}; inspection (for relief); by implication, superintendence; specially, the Christian "episcopate"

1985.definition: [ἐπίσκοπος] from {{G1909}} and {{G4649}} (in the sense of {{G1983}}); a superintendent, i.e. Christian officer in genitive case charge of a (or the) church (literally or figuratively)

1986.definition: [ἐπισπάομαι] from {{G1909}} and {{G4685}}; to draw over, i.e. (with {{G203}} implied) efface the mark of circumcision (by recovering with the foreskin)

1987.definition: [ἐπίσταμαι] apparently a middle voice of {{G2186}} (with {{G3563}} implied); to put the mind upon, i.e. comprehend, or be acquainted with

1988.definition: [ἐπιστάτης] from {{G1909}} and a presumed derivative of {{G2476}}; an appointee over, i.e. commander (teacher)

1989.definition: [ἐπιστέλλω] from {{G1909}} and {{G4724}}; to enjoin (by writing), i.e. (genitive case) to communicate by letter (for any purpose)

1991.definition: [ἐπιστηρίζω] from {{G1909}} and {{G4741}}; to support further, i.e. reestablish

1993.definition: [ἐπιστομίζω] from {{G1909}} and {{G4750}}; to put something over the mouth, i.e. (figuratively) to silence

1994.definition: [ἐπιστρέφω] from {{G1909}} and {{G4762}}; to revert (literally, figuratively or morally)

1996.definition: [ἐπισυνάγω] from {{G1909}} and {{G4863}}; to collect upon the same place

1997.definition: [ἐπισυναγωγή] from {{G1996}}; a complete collection; especially a Christian meeting (for worship)

1998.definition: [ἐπισυντρέχω] from {{G1909}} and {{G4936}}; to hasten together upon one place (or a particular occasion)

1999.definition: [ἐπισύστασις] from the middle voice of a compound of {{G1909}} and {{G4921}}; a conspiracy, i.e. concourse (riotous or friendly)

2000.definition: [ἐπισφαλής] from a compound of {{G1909}} and σφάλλω (to trip); figuratively, insecure
